(Q) HIGH NOTE
 11/9/7/5s   60/65/70/75 
                                
                                
                                Deals 60 magic damage (60/75/90/105 + 40% ) in target area, increased by 0% - 50% with the enemies' missing Health.Reaches maximum damage when the target is below 25% Health.

w.name: (W) SURROUND SOUND
w.description:
(W) SURROUND SOUND
 24/22/20/18s   40/60/80/100 
                                
                                
                                Shields all nearby ally champions for 50 (50/80/110/140 + 25% ) damage for 2.5 seconds and grant them 20/22.5/25/27.5% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds.If Seraphine is already shielded, nearby allies are healed for 5% of their missing Health (5% + 0.01% ), increased by 50% for each ally.

e.name: (E) BEAT DROP

(E) BEAT DROP
 12/11/10/9s   60/70/80/90 
                                
                                
                                Deals 60 magic damage (60/95/130/165 + 50% ) to enemies and slows them by 99% for 1 seconds.If the enemy is already slowed, they are rooted instead. If they are rooted, they are sunned.
